name: Data Research And Development Agency
goal:
DataRADA promotes technologies that facilitate data-driven policy debate and strengthen the integrity of policy-making.

DataRADA helps academics, researchers from civil society organisations, NGOs, nonprofits, think tanks and educational organizations to exercise a stronger impact on the EU policy-making via computerized tools, expert feedbacks and knowledge banks.
euInitiatives:
DataRADA follows all policies and legislative files in the area of better regulation and evidence-based policy-making, including:

- Open Government & Open Data

- e-Democracy in the European Union

- Scientific Foresight

- Interinstitutional Agreement on Better Law-Making (Better Regulation)

- Transparency of the legislative process
